messages.content:
taking into accout this number:{{1.call.from_number}}

I want you to add at first a 1 if the number doens't have it at the first digit

And to remove a 1 if the number has it at the first digit

For example, if the number is 19083456745 you will output 9083456745

But if the number is 9083456745 you will output 19083456745

Just output the number
